channel.title: Redmi Pad SE MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater
channel.description: Your best website to track MIUI ROM releases!

image.title: Redmi Pad SE MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

item.title: MIUI OS2.0.1.0.VMUTWXM Fastboot update for Redmi Pad SE Taiwan
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi Pad SE Taiwan

Codename: xun

Version: OS2.0.1.0.VMUTWXM | 15.0

Size: 5.3 GB

MD5: 137b61a463201f2807d9450a4d6b6b52

Changelog:
[System]
Updated the security patch to January 2025. Increased system security.
[Alive Design Philosophy]
Alive Design Philosophy unveils fresh, vibrant design across the whole system, making every interaction feel smooth and alive.
All-new Gallery:
With AI and reorganized collections, Gallery makes your memories even more vivid.
All-new Weather
Real-time Weather Engine 2.0 shows you the sky and clouds just like in real life – even lets you see rainbows and the Milky Way.
All-new Calendar:
The new Desktop calendar adds a touch of ritual to your day.
All-new Clock:
Updated Clock uses a more refined display structure for a more elegant, easy-to-read look.
Updated animations:
A full-scale animation upgrade makes every interaction flow smoothly and feel stable, responsive, and comfortable.

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI OS2.0.201.0.VMUIDXM Fastboot update for Redmi Pad SE Indonesia
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi Pad SE Indonesia

Codename: xun

Version: OS2.0.201.0.VMUIDXM | 15.0

Size: 5.6 GB

MD5: ba1dd3f441e0d10809ffe862622f224f

Changelog:
[System animations]
Optimization: Interrupt animation during app transitions
Optimization: Interrupt animation when closing apps in Landscape mode
Optimization: Interrupt animation when entering subpages within apps
[System]
New: Home screen wallpaper now supports a blur effect
Optimization: Scrolling performance on content feeds in some third party apps
Optimization: Updated styles for some classic pages
Updated the security patch to August 2025. Increased system security.
[Basic experience]
Optimization: Tweaked the Storage refresh algorithm so it activates more often
[Lock screen]
New: Eastern aesthetics lock screen templates
[Status bar, Notification shade]
New: Some status bar icons now support custom display

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI OS1.0.3.0.UMUCNXM Recovery update for Redmi Pad SE China
item.description:
New Stable Beta Recovery update available!

Device: Redmi Pad SE China

Codename: xun

Version: OS1.0.3.0.UMUCNXM | 14.0

Size: 4.2 GB

MD5: a8dd939e4fdeb440bd52fcb16bc0d069

Changelog:
[System]
Updated Android Security Patch to January 2024. Increased system security.
[Comprehensive refactoring]
Storage refresh technology makes your device work fast for much longer via smart defragmentation
Intelligent network selection makes your connection smoother in poor network environments
[Vibrant aesthetics]
Global aesthetics draw inspiration from life itself and change the way your device looks and feels
New animation language makes interactions with your device wholesome and intuitive
Natural colors bring vibrancy and vitality to every corner of your device
Our all-new system font supports multiple writing systems
Redesigned Weather app not only gives you important information, but also shows you how it feels outside
Notifications are focused on important information, presenting it to you in the most efficient way
New Home screen icons refresh familiar items with new shapes and colors

Download: Here
